mapper.select: select a.post_id, a.post_title, a.post_context, a.away_id, count(b.post_id) as comment_count from matching_post a left join matching_request_form b on a.post_id = b.post_id group by a.post_id;

SELECT mp.post_id, mp.post_title, mp.post_context, mp.post_date, mp.Score, u.user_age, u.user_weight, u.user_win, u.user_lose FROM matching_post mp JOIN user u ON mp.user_id = u.user_id where mp.post_id = #{postId};
